title: What champions benefit well from AS runes?
body:
I wanted to try some AS runes and I bought 3 quints but I wasn't sure what champions would get the most benefit from them. I figured maybe someone like Tryndamere/Volibear/Gangplank/Master Yi/Yasuo ...etc  just people you usually would build AS items on. 

I don't see hardly anyone use AS runes on ADC champions but I suppose they would work on them even though you are sacrificing damage. 

I am aware there are tons of champions that benefit from AS items but I'm focusing mostly on champions that would benefit from AS "RUNES"

replies.body:
AS quints are actually pretty common on many ADC runepages from what I've seen. Certainly a viable use if you run them with AD reds.

I know some tank junglers take them to help w/ early clears. You also see them on certain top lane fighters, particularly those that care about on-hit effects. Irelia and Fizz are two that jump to mind. And then if you don't have AD quints, other AA-heavy fighters (Aatrox, Jax, Trundle) can make use of them as well.

Side note, does anyone else find high AS kalista hard to play? It might be that I don't have the timing down pat yet, but I find it really hard to jump between autos when you have like 1.50-2.00 AS.

It was easier when the passive had that indicator line that would tell you when you could jump and how far you would jump but for some reason it seems to have vanished.

It was there when she was released on the PBE but I've never seen it on the live servers.

I'd only go AS on him with {{champion:201}} support. He's good at all-in's, and Braum getting his passive to connect could mean a real fast kill if Draven does AA+E+AAx2 on them, knock aside, then stun. There's a good chance they'll die before they could even flash out. AS quints just makes it more likely you'll land the stun before they react. And yeh, it's pretty much all for the 1st blood potential. Get that and you can go buy an early pickaxe to make up for less AD on runes. I'd say AS quints on any adc with a good level 1-3 all-in would be worthwhile with Braum. Even if you fail the 1st blood, you have a lot of potential to force them to b early and kinda auto-win lane by being a level up/bully them out of farming.

The general rule is that they are good on champions whose abilities amplify their auto attacks rather than being nukes themselves.  For instance, darius probably scales better off of armor pen or AD because his abilities scale with it in addition to his auto attacks.  Someone like tryndamere or vayne, however, are based almost entirely off their auto attacks, and so derive maximum benefit from it.

Anyone with an on-hit based playstyle.

Only if you go Phoenix Udyr. Q scales much better with AD (it does a 2nd DoT based on your AD, but ignores your AS for that effect, and each auto adds a % of your AD to it) So much so that if, despite AS being better for most junglers, you start Q on Udyr, flat AD gives you a faster clear speed. Also Tiger buff at rank 5+3 stacks of passive = 100% bonus AS, running AS quints on him, plus any kind of attack speed items, you're running the risk of maxing at 2.5 and wasting some AS.
